summary: A mine just across the river from Riverwood with 2 of each ore/mine type that will never be depleted.
descriptionHtml:
A mine accessed from a trapdoor just across the river to the north-west of Riverwood south of the small waterfall.

It has 2 of each ore/mine type including the Geode found in Blackreach witch can give filled gems. The mines will almost never be depleted!

It also has 3 Notched and normal a Pickaxe.

For faster mining you can try my [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30819]faster mining animation mod[/url]
author: The Old One

files.name: Free Mine 1-2
files.changelogHtml:
Added a new test mine in the back that gives a random mix of ore.
Changed the Geode mine, in this mine only, to a different script that will sometimes give filled gems.
added a backup "unlimited" code so even the never depleted code breaks there will be 2 billion in the mine.
added map marker

files.name: Free Mine 1-3
files.changelogHtml:
Yet another attempt to fix scripting errors (make sure the scripts install and you are loading loose files)
Added a new test mine in the back that gives a lot of gems and some ore next to the mixed ore.
